price: 7. Tan shanaad (waa inuu ku dhaarto) in Nacaladda Alle ku dhacdo hadduu been sheegayo.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisatu anna laʿnata al-lahi ʿalayhi in kāna mina al-kādhibīna
